text: Yisakalaka kitaba pradana karaa haiche sihamtara majata yisakale allahara prati bisbasa nakarae arau sesa dirasara prati'o imana posana nakarae lagate allaha arau te'omra raachule yi haraama karaiche seya haraama buli ganya nakarae; arau satya dbinara anusarana nakarae; sihamte nata hai nija hate jiya'iya nidiya laike sihamtara lagata yud'dha karaa
